game_description: Take on Ram-Bam, Lamb-Bam and the whole bleatin' clan in the exciting Alpine climbing adventure that pits your wits against the meanest sheep in the mountain. Loaded with half-crazed herds, twisting targets and awesome fairway sounds, Yodel-Oh is guaranteed to have you lacing up your lederhosen and yodeling for more. Download it today! Features: • Fast-paced, target-plinking fun! • Original polka music and genuine yodeling! • Plenty of ducks, gophers, rabbits and mice (Why? Why not?) • Swiss maidens • Unlock fun trophies • Fun for the entire family and great for parties Made in the USA by Little 10 Robot
review_1: I grew up playing in shooting galleries at the fair and traveling carnivals in the 70s and 80s and this game took me right back to my youth. This game is simple, silly and so much fun! It is addicting, you'll never get that song out of your head! It does have progressions that keeps the game getting tougher and faster as you move on. Be aware of your surroundings because things pop up on your sides and behind you.
review_2: Set in a Swiss chalet, with a funfair type of shooting gallery. Hilarious yodelling music and cute graphics. Swivel around and shoot various other objects like the cuckoo clock and beer tankered to activate them. An array of achievements to be had too. Great watching the Swiss man gradually climb the mountain each time you hit the wrong targets which include the pop up Swiss maidens. When the man reaches the summit its game over, thus providing an interesting and fun way to end the game. The longer you survive the more different types of targets appear adding to the interest. The type of game where you have to have 'just one more turn'. Well done the developers for a producing a novel twist on a carnival shooting game. In my opinion you can't go wrong for the price.
